pages.text: "A machine used to infuse various materials into (generally) metals to create metal alloys and other compounds." $(p)The Metallurgic Infuser is most likely where you will begin on your Mekanism journey. This machine will be vital in crafting key components, namely alloys and circuits, for

other Mekanism recipes. It uses Infuse Types as "fuel" for infusions.$(p)$(bold)Supported Upgrades:$()$(li)$(l:item/upgrades/upgrade_speed)Speed Upgrades$(/l) (8) $(li)$(l:item/upgrades/upgrade_energy)Energy Upgrades$(/l) (8) $(li)$(l:item/upgrades/upgrade_muffling)Muffling Upgrades$(/l) (4)
